content:
使用教学pvf
Script\monster\new_goblin\action\throw.act
调用测试投掷哥布林

核心代码解析：

关闭怪物的破坏框
[SET DAMAGE BOX]
    [OFF]
解除无敌就是打开破坏框
[SET DAMAGE BOX]
    [ON]

模板

#PVF_File

[MOTION]
	[BASE ANI]
		`../animation/Throw.ani`
	[SOUND]
		`THROW_STONE`	0	
	[/SOUND]
	[SPEECH]
		`無敵效果`	1	100	
	[/SPEECH]
[/MOTION]

[TRIGGER]
	[FRAME]
		2	2	
	[DO BEHAVIOR]
	[ME]
		0	
[/TRIGGER]
[BEHAVIOR]
	[SET DAMAGE BOX]
	[OFF]
[/BEHAVIOR]
